page.title: 19Work in Waltham St Lawrence
page.content:
There are three main places where people from the villages work.
Some of the people are employed locally on the farms, in the shops, pubs and petrol stations but most of the workers travel more then 5 miles to work. For this they have to use their cars.
{London}is one of the major areas of employment for local people, they are{ {Commuters}mostly using{cars}or{rail} from Twyford.
A number of local people are{ {self-employed}and work from home. These include a{picture framer, soil {engineer, polystyrene sculptor}and{gun {engraver}.
